titleStmt.title: The case of the Lady Bridgman: a real mortgagee of an estate in Essex for 2000l. principal-money. Upon the petition of Josiah Thwaites, who pretends title to the said estate.
titleStmt.author: Bridgeman, Susanna, Lady, ca. 1685-1747.
Thwaites, Josiah.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
